item.description:
Join LISA LELAS, professional organizer/goal setting coach/author & host of 'Simply Organized' on cable TV

 So, how are YOUR New Years Resolutions working for you this year? If you need a little motivation and a whole lot of inspiration to help you along, don't miss this special presentation by AWBL leadership board member, Lisa Lelas!   It's time to turn your Dreams and Goals into Reality!  Explore how the Law Of Attraction can really work for you. Learn how to create your own personal vision board with Lisa's 'Treasure Mapping' adventure, highlighting your goals and building an inspirational road map for focus, growth and goal attainment. It's easy...and it's FUN! 

  Lisa is a magazine editor, newspaper columnist and the author of several books, including the bestselling, "SIMPLE STEPS: 10 Weeks to Getting Control of Your Life" (NAL/Penguin Books, NY). She has been featured several times on the Oprah Winfrey Show, Today Show, NBC News, Ladies Home Journal, and more. Her popular TV show, "Simply Organized" currently airs on community cable stations in more than 50 CT towns. 

www.LifeStylingwithLisa.com
item.name: Treasure Mapping Your Goals for 2012 with Lisa Lelas
